controls.title: Understanding the Organization and its Context
controls.description: Determine external and internal issues relevant to AI systems purpose and strategic direction

controls.title: Understanding Needs and Expectations of Interested Parties
controls.description: Determine interested parties relevant to the AIMS including regulatory requirements and societal expectations

controls.title: Leadership and Commitment
controls.description: Top management shall demonstrate leadership and commitment to AI governance including ethical considerations

controls.title: AI Policy
controls.description: Establish AI policy addressing responsible AI development, deployment, and use

controls.title: AI System Risk Assessment
controls.description: Identify and assess risks specific to AI systems including bias, fairness, and unintended consequences

controls.title: AI System Impact Assessment
controls.description: Assess potential impacts of AI systems on individuals, groups, and society

controls.title: AI Objectives and Planning
controls.description: Establish measurable AI objectives consistent with AI policy and ethical requirements

controls.title: Competence
controls.description: Ensure persons working with AI systems have necessary competence including AI ethics and responsible AI

controls.title: Communication
controls.description: Determine communications relevant to AI systems including transparency about AI use

controls.title: AI System Life Cycle Processes
controls.description: Plan, implement, and control processes for AI system life cycle including design, development, and deployment

controls.title: Data for AI Systems
controls.description: Manage data used by AI systems including data quality, provenance, and bias mitigation

controls.title: AI Model Management
controls.description: Establish processes for AI model development, validation, versioning, and retirement

controls.title: AI System Verification and Validation
controls.description: Verify and validate AI systems meet specified requirements and intended purpose

controls.title: Monitoring AI System Performance
controls.description: Monitor and measure AI system performance including accuracy, fairness, and drift

controls.title: AI System Audit and Assessment
controls.description: Conduct audits and assessments of AI systems for compliance with objectives and ethical requirements

controls.title: Internal Audit
controls.description: Conduct internal audits to ensure AIMS conforms to requirements and is effectively implemented

controls.title: Nonconformity and Corrective Action
controls.description: Address nonconformities in AI systems including unintended behaviors and ethical violations

controls.title: Continual Improvement
controls.description: Continually improve the AIMS including AI system fairness, transparency, and accountability

controls.title: AI Policies
controls.description: Establish and communicate policies for responsible AI including ethical use and societal impact

controls.title: Internal Organization
controls.description: Define roles and responsibilities for AI governance including ethics committees

controls.title: Resources for AI Systems
controls.description: Manage resources for AI systems including computing, data, and specialized expertise

controls.title: Assessing Impacts of AI Systems
controls.description: Assess and address potential negative impacts of AI systems before and during operation

controls.title: AI System Life Cycle
controls.description: Manage AI system throughout its life cycle with appropriate governance at each stage

controls.title: Data for AI Systems
controls.description: Ensure data quality, appropriateness, and bias mitigation for AI systems

controls.title: Third-Party and Customer Relationships
controls.description: Manage third-party AI components and customer use of AI systems responsibly
